section.title: Backward compatibility summary
section.para: CAS has been updated to use the latest version of Java WS Core, which now supports the final version of WSRF/WSN specification.. This service is not compatible with the previous stable versions, GT 4.0.x
Fixed SAML assertions embedded in proxy to comply with RFC 3820 requirements. CAS assertions generated by default in GT 4.0.x will not be consumed by GT 4.2.x services that use assertions.
